inclusion.criterion: Liver cirrhosis of any etiology diagnosed by clinical parameters involving laboratory tests, endoscopic or radiologic evidence of cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of decompensation (hepatic encephalopathy, ascites, variceal bleeding, jaundice)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Advanced chronic kidney disease G4(GFR category grade 4) according to KDIGO guidelines.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients on acute or chronic renal replacement therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ambiguous diagnosis of AKI and phenotype of AKI
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Lab results show hemoglobin: 9.7 g/dL, platelet: 110,000 /cu.mm, creatinine: 3.6 mg/dL, BUN: 73 mg/dL, direct bilirubin: 2.4 mg/dL, LDH: 881 IU/L.
